eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 03:23 PM ON NOV 14, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:46 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for (City, County or Tribal Entity). This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. (LEO Name) is looking for (sex M; F; name of victim)) last seen (on foot wearing or driving). If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
